___activeParameter.description: The active parameter of the active signature.

___documentation.description:
The human-readable doc-comment of this signature. Will be shown

in the UI but can be omitted.

items.description:
Represents a parameter of a callable-signature. A parameter can

have a label and a doc-comment.

The ParameterInformation namespace provides helper functions to work with

[ParameterInformation](#ParameterInformation) literals.

___label.description:
The label of this signature. Will be shown in

the UI.

items.description:
Represents the signature of something callable. A signature

can have a label, like a function-name, a doc-comment, and

a set of parameters.

The SignatureInformation namespace provides helper functions to work with

[SignatureInformation](#SignatureInformation) literals.

___containerName.description: The name of the symbol containing this symbol.

___documentation.description: A human-readable string that represents a doc-comment.

___insertText.description:
A string that should be inserted a document when selecting

this completion. When `falsy` the [label](#CompletionItem.label)

is used.

___sortText.description:
A string that shoud be used when comparing this item

with other items. When `falsy` the [label](#CompletionItem.label)

is used.

___kind.description:
The kind of this completion item. Based of the kind

an icon is chosen by the editor.

___filterText.description:
A string that should be used when filtering a set of

completion items. When `falsy` the [label](#CompletionItem.label)

is used.

___range.description:
The range of the text document to be manipulated. To insert

text into a document create a range where start === end.

___newText.description:
The string to be inserted. For delete operations use an

empty string.

___textEdit.description:
An [edit](#TextEdit) which is applied to a document when selecting

this completion. When an edit is provided the value of

[insertText](#CompletionItem.insertText) is ignored.

___label.description:
The label of this completion item. By default

also the text that is inserted when selecting

this completion.

___detail.description:
A human-readable string with additional information

about this item, like type or symbol information.

___data.description:
An data entry field that is preserved on a completion item between

a [CompletionRequest](#CompletionRequest) and a [CompletionResolveRequest]

(#CompletionResolveRequest)

___command.description: The identifier of the actual command handler.

___arguments.description:
Arguments that the command handler should be

invoked with.

___command.description: The command this code lens represents.

___range.description: The range in which this code lens is valid. Should only span a single line.

___data.description:
An data entry field that is preserved on a code lens item between

a [CodeLensRequest](#CodeLensRequest) and a [CodeLensResolveRequest]

(#CodeLensResolveRequest)

___documentation.description:
The human-readable doc-comment of this signature. Will be shown

in the UI but can be omitted.

___label.description:
The label of this signature. Will be shown in

the UI.

___isIncomplete.description:
This list it not complete. Further typing should result in recomputing

this list.

___insertText.description:
A string that should be inserted a document when selecting

this completion. When `falsy` the [label](#CompletionItem.label)

is used.

___sortText.description:

with other items. When `falsy` the [label](#CompletionItem.label)

___kind.description:

items.description:
A completion item represents a text snippet that is

proposed to complete text that is being typed.

The CompletionItem namespace provides functions to deal with

completion items.

___tabSize.description: Size of a tab in spaces.

___all.description: Gets all text edits for this change.

___delete.description: Delete the text at the given range.

___replace.description: Replace the given range with given text for the given resource.

___insert.description: Insert the given text at the given position.

___clear.description: Clears the edits for this change.

___range.description: The range this highlight applies to.

___code.description: The diagnostic's code. Can be omitted.

___severity.description:
The diagnostic's severity. Can be omitted. If omitted it is up to the

client to interpret diagnostics as error, warning, info or hint.

___range.description: The range at which the message applies

___source.description:
A human-readable string describing the source of this

diagnostic, e.g. 'typescript' or 'super lint'.

items.description:
Represents a diagnostic, such as a compiler error or warning. Diagnostic objects

are only valid in the scope of a resource.

The Diagnostic namespace provides helper functions to work with

[Diagnostic](#Diagnostic) literals.

$eref.description:
Position in a text document expressed as zero-based line and character offset.

The Position namespace provides helper functions to work with

[Position](#Position) literals.

___character.description: Character offset on a line in a document (zero-based).

items.description:
A text edit applicable to a text document.

The TextEdit namespace provides helper function to create replace,

insert and delete edits more easily.

___getTextEditChange.description:
Returns the [TextEditChange](#TextEditChange) to manage text edits

for resources.

The TextEdit namespace provides helper function to create replace,

insert and delete edits more easily.

___edit.description:
Returns the underlying [WorkspaceEdit](#WorkspaceEdit) literal

use to be returned from a workspace edit operation like rename.
